Do allow some times for your mobile to transfer Watch Face to your watch.2. Please execute 'Re-sync app' under Android Wear App on your mobile after install, this is to synchronize the watch face.3. Long press your watch and choose Stylish Modern Watch Face as your watch faceCompatible with all round and square watches.
descriptionHTML:
Modern and stylish digital/analog watch face.

Feature:
Time and Date display.
Watch and phone battery indicator.
Minutes centralized time presentation.

To install:
1. Do allow some times for your mobile to transfer Watch Face to your watch.
2. Please execute 'Re-sync app' under Android Wear App on your mobile after install, this is to synchronize the watch face.
3. Long press your watch and choose Stylish Modern Watch Face as your watch face
Compatible with all round and square watches.
comments: I like it, and will probably use it the most out of all my watch faces.  The color scheme (shades of brown) isn't something I'd have chosen, but I don't hate it like some of the comments here.  Still, with different color options, this face will be perfect for me.
Brown is horrible. Wanted the black view
I love the ambient mode. Interactive mode is ugly. Maybe bcs it's in brown.
Looks great on my huawei w1. Really clear to see the time and toggling for date is helpful. I like that when you toggle you can see battery for both watch and phone. Great!
Looks ugly on watches with square display
Can't seem to get it on my Marshal Q, I can't find it even after the re-sync
